states.name: Ready
exit_hints: An endpoint that receives a STOP_SENDING frame MUST send a RESET_STREAM frame if the stream is in the "Ready" state.
A receiver MAY send a STOP_SENDING frame in any state where it has not received a RESET_STREAM frame.
If the stream is in the "Recv" or "Size Known" state, the transport SHOULD signal this by sending a STOP_SENDING frame.

states.name: Send
exit_hints: An endpoint that receives a STOP_SENDING frame MUST send a RESET_STREAM frame if the stream is in the "Send" state.

states.name: Data Sent
exit_hints: If the stream is in the "Data Sent" state, the endpoint MAY defer sending the RESET_STREAM frame.

states.name: Recv
exit_hints: If the stream is in the "Recv" or "Size Known" state, the transport SHOULD signal this by sending a STOP_SENDING frame.

states.name: Size Known
enter_hints: The receiving part of the stream then enters the "Size Known" state.
exit_hints: If the stream is in the "Recv" or "Size Known" state, the transport SHOULD signal this by sending a STOP_SENDING frame.
